layout/base:
{{{head.meta_tags}}} {{{head.config}}} {{{stylesheet '/assets/css/theme.css'}}} {{ getFontsCollection }} {{{head.scripts}}} {{{head.rsslinks}}} {{inject 'themeImageSizes' theme_images}} {{> components/global-injects}} {{{snippet 'html_head'}}} {{> core/structured-data/website}} {{{snippet 'header'}}} {{#if page_type '===' 'product'}} {{> components/common/facebook-like}} {{else if page_type '===' 'blog_post'}} {{> components/common/facebook-like}} {{/if}} {{> svg/sprite}}
{{> components/page/nav-bar compact=true}} {{> components/page/sidebar}}
{{> components/page-header}}
{{#block "page"}}{{/block}}
{{> components/banner banners.bottom}} {{> components/page-footer}}
{{> core/structured-data/breadcrumbs}}
{{{footer.scripts}}}
{{{snippet 'footer'}}}
core/alerts/alert-error:
{{#if dismissable}}×{{/if}}
{{#if message}} {{{message}}} {{else}} {{{this}}} {{/if}}
components/page/nav-bar:
{{#if compact}} {{! Nav Drawer Toggle }} {{else}} {{! Back to Content toggle }} {{#block "page-header"}}{{/block}} {{/if}}
{{#if compact}} {{! Logo }} {{> components/page/logo}} {{/if}}
{{#unless compact}} {{! Currency Switcher }} {{> components/currency-selector}} {{! Account Links }} {{#if customer }} Account / Log Out {{else}} Account {{/if}} {{! Cart }} {{> components/cart/mini-cart minicart=true}} {{! Search }} {{> components/search-box mini=true navbar=true}}
{{else}} {{! Mini Cart - requires a wrapper for ajax content to load into}} {{> components/cart/mini-cart minicart=false}} {{/unless}}
components/page/sidebar:
{{! Search Box }}
{{{snippet 'forms_search'}}} {{> components/search-box mini=true}}
{{! Navigation and Logo }}
{{> components/page/logo}} {{> components/navigation}}
{{! Currency Selector }}
{{> components/currency-selector}}
{{! Account Link }}
{{#unless customer.id}} {{{lang 'common.sitemap.login'}}} {{else}} {{{lang 'common.sitemap.account'}}} {{{lang 'common.sitemap.logout'}}} {{/unless}}
components/page-header:
<header class="main-header wrapper">

  {{> components/product/free-shipping-message}}
  {{> components/product/free-shipping-message shipping_messages=product.shipping_messages}}

  {{> components/page/nav-bar compact=false}}

  {{> components/banner banners.top}}

</header>
components/page-footer:
{{! Footer Menu }}

{{{lang 'common.sitemap.title'}}}

{{> components/footer-navigation}}
{{! Social Links }} {{#if social_media.length}}

{{lang 'common.follow_us'}}

{{> components/social-media-links}}
{{/if}} {{! Newsletter Signup }} {{#if settings.show_newsletter_box}}

{{{lang 'common.newsletter.heading'}}}

{{> components/common/newsletter-subscribe}}
{{/if}}
{{! Address Information }} {{#if settings.address}}

{{{settings.address}}}

{{/if}} {{! Copyright Message }} {{#if theme_settings.copyright_year}}

{{{lang 'common.copyright'}}} {{settings.store_name}}

{{/if}} {{! Attribution Message }} {{#if theme_settings.theme_credits}}

{{{lang 'common.footer_message'}}}

{{/if}}

svg/social/youtube:
<svg
  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
  width="20"
  height="14"
  viewBox="0 0 20 14"
  aria-label="YouTube"
  role="icon">
  <title>YouTube</title>
  <path fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd" d="M19.937 10.564V3.436S19.937 0 16.502 0H3.435S0 0 0 3.436v7.128S0 14 3.435 14h13.067s3.435 0 3.435-3.436M13.84 7.01l-6.53 3.833V3.176l6.53 3.834"/>
</svg>

Pass in @param img The image object @param size The preset size to use. @param url Optional: Set the url this image should link to. @param default Default image to display @param image-ratio The image class to apply to the wrapping element. @param not-lazy Optional: do not lazy load (mainly used for ajax-loaded images) --}} {{#if not-lazy}} {{#if url}} {{else}}
